info.title: EVJoints Admin API
info.description: API documentation for EVJoints Admin Dashboard backend

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of customers with their vehicle information, device details, and subscription status. Supports server-side sorting.

get.summary: Get paginated list of station submissions
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of charging station submissions with comprehensive filtering options. Supports filtering by status, date range, and search terms. Returns detailed information including station details, network info, connectors, photos, and eVolts.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Filter stations submitted on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Filter stations submitted on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by station name, landmark, contact number, or station ID

put.description: Performs actions on a station submission: SAVE, APPROVE, REJECT.

get.summary: Get paginated list of trip check-ins
get.description: Retrieves trip records with filtering by status and story presence.

get.summary: Get paginated list of charging stations
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of approved charging stations with comprehensive filtering options. Supports filtering by operational status, usage type, network, and search terms. Returns detailed information including station details, network info, connectors, and media.

parameters.name: networkId
parameters.description: Filter by network ID (use 'All' for no filter)

parameters.name: addedBy
parameters.description: Filter by who added the station (EVJoints = CPO, Users = EV Owner/Station Owner)

parameters.name: chargerType
parameters.description: Filter by charger type (AC or DC)

parameters.name: stationType
parameters.description: Filter by station type/landmark (use 'All' for no filter)

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Filter stations created on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Filter stations created on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Universal search across all fields: station name, network name, contact, added by, location, station type, usage type, and station ID

200.description: Successful response with charging station data

post.description: Creates a new charging station with connectors and photos. Includes comprehensive validation at station and connector levels.

errors: Connector 2: count must be at least 1

put.summary: Update charging station or perform actions
put.description: Performs actions on a charging station: EDIT, ENABLE, DISABLE, DELETE.

action.description: Action to perform on the charging station

connectors.description: Array of connector configurations (for EDIT action)

400.description: Invalid action or missing required fields

value.message: Invalid action. Must be EDIT, ENABLE, DISABLE, or DELETE
stationName, latitude, longitude, and usageType are required for EDIT action

post.summary: Mass upload charging stations via CSV/Excel
post.description: Upload multiple charging stations using a CSV or Excel file with comprehensive validation and error reporting

file.description: CSV or Excel file containing station data

400.description: No file uploaded or invalid file

get.description: Returns a list of active and inactive networks.
